languages.text: "Двое людишек сговорились — как предсказуемо! Ревущие, убейте людишко медленно, я хочу позабавиться {mf|его|ее} мучениями".
"The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."
languages.original_text: "Двое людишек сговорились — как предсказуемо! Ревущие, убейте людишко медленно, я хочу позабавиться {mf|его|ее} мучениями".

traits.locale_text: "The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."
"The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."
"The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."
"The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

languages.text: “两个小人儿打算密谋对付我，我早就猜到了！尖啸者们，别让这个小人儿死得太快，我要好好享受{mf|他|她}的痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: “两个小人儿打算密谋对付我，我早就猜到了！尖啸者们，别让这个小人儿死得太快，我要好好享受{mf|他|她}的痛苦。”

languages.text: «Los dos humanos conspiran contra mí. ¡Qué predecible! Aulladores, matad lentamente a{mf|l| la} human{mf|o|a}. Quiero disfrutar con su sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: "The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: «Los dos humanos conspiran contra mí. ¡Qué predecible! Aulladores, matad lentamente a{mf|l| la} human{mf|o|a}. Quiero disfrutar con su sufrimiento».

languages.text: 「ふたりの人間がこの私に陰謀を企てるとは、なんという茶番。シュリーカーども、この人間をゆっくりとなぶり殺せ。奴が苦痛に顔をゆがめるのをじっくりと味わいたい」
languages.original_text: "The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: 「ふたりの人間がこの私に陰謀を企てるとは、なんという茶番。シュリーカーども、この人間をゆっくりとなぶり殺せ。奴が苦痛に顔をゆがめるのをじっくりと味わいたい」

languages.text: "Die zwei Menschlinge haben sich gegen mich verschworen — wie vorhersehbar! Kreischer, tötet den Menschling langsam, ich will {mf|seine|ihre} Qualen genießen."
languages.original_text: "The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: "Die zwei Menschlinge haben sich gegen mich verschworen — wie vorhersehbar! Kreischer, tötet den Menschling langsam, ich will {mf|seine|ihre} Qualen genießen."

languages.text: « Les deux humains qui complotent contre moi... Quelle surprise ! Hurleurs, tuez l'{mf|humain|humaine} lentement, je veux savourer sa souffrance. »
languages.original_text: "The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: « Les deux humains qui complotent contre moi... Quelle surprise ! Hurleurs, tuez l'{mf|humain|humaine} lentement, je veux savourer sa souffrance. »

languages.text: "İki insancık arkamdan iş çevirmiş. Hayret! Çığırtkanlar, insancığı yavaş yavaş öldürün. Çektiği çilenin tadına varmak istiyorum."
languages.original_text: "The two humanlings have plotted against me — how predictable! Shriekers, kill the humanling slowly, I want to enjoy {mf|his|her} torment."

traits.locale_text: "İki insancık arkamdan iş çevirmiş. Hayret! Çığırtkanlar, insancığı yavaş yavaş öldürün. Çektiği çilenin tadına varmak istiyorum."
